title: Looking for a MID Laner for a Serious Ranked team, Silver to Gold
body:
Hello everyone, I am Diaherra Blaster, I am 19 years old and I am creating a serious ranked team.
Last season I got to Gold 1 and I main ADC so that role would be full.
I am currently looking for a Mid Laner
Please fill this out if you are looking to Join my team.

1.IGN:
2.Solo q rank this/ last season:
3.Role:
4.Your age and Time Zone:
5.Your best champions:
6.Why you want to join the team?

The Practice times for this team will be during the weekdays.
Nothing is set in stone yet, schedule depends on the players.
Looking at 4-5 times during the weekdays in the evenings, around 6-6:30 EST till 9-9:30 EST
Weekends would be occasional/ when tournaments are.
Looking for people who don't Flame or Rage and want to Improve their skills in league and grow as a team.

Feel free to post on here or add me in-game to talk about this Position.

NOTE: We will be playing right now, So Just add me in and and come try-out for the team .

Thanks Diaherra Blaster.

replies.body:
1.IGN: Hurkk
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: S3: gold 1/S4: gold 2/Currently: gold 2
3.Role: Mid
4.Your age and Time Zone: 18 EST
5.Your best champions: Oriana, velkoz, Casiopeia, Yasuo, Annivia
6.Why you want to join the team? I have a lot of soloQ expérience but i want to improve and have fun in a other way that soloQ cannot provide. I am a talkative guy who likes to improve and always try new things. I think i could be a perfect addition to the team!

1.IGN: Cybor39 (Could be switching it soon)
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Gold 5, Gold 5
3.Role: Mid
4.Your age and Time Zone: 18 PST
5.Your best champions: Cassiopeia, Katarina, Lissandra, Teemo (top)
6.Why you want to join the team? Looking for friends and a serious team that actually wants to improve their skill in this game. Still like solo queue but it would be nice to get better through good teamwork.

1.IGN: Carcharioi
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Unranked
3.Role: Mid
4.Your age and Time Zone: EST
5.Your best champions: Annie and Viktor
6.Why you want to join the team? I'd like to be on a team to grow and improve. It also can be a great place to meet other friendly summoners with the same goals as myself.

1.IGN: Nerviris
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Silver 3/Silver 5
3.Role: Mid
4.Your age and Time Zone: 20/PST
5.Your best champions: Zyra, Ahri, Katarina, Orianna, Lissandra, Lux, Vel'Koz, Zed, Annie, and Diana
6.Why you want to join the team? I want to get a new learning experience, and work with a team that actually stays active.

1.IGN: PROvensKILL
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: 4-0 Provisionals right now / Gold 2 main
3.Role: Mid Laner
4.Your age and Time Zone: 22 EST
5.Your best champions: Ahri, Xerath, TF, LeBlanc, Zed. Comfortable with any champ for comps
6.Why you want to join the team? I would love to join a highly motivated team looking to take their skills to the next level. I am a quick learner, experienced shot caller, and very team oriented player, which is why I enjoy team play. Playing ranked 5's makes the game really fun for me and I love the competitive environment!

Hey DB!

I'm looking forward to playing with you to try me out and vice versa. I've been playing since season 2 and am finally looking to step up my game and really improve as a player. I hope you take me into consideration for your team, it would be a blast!

-LB

1.IGN: LostBast
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Gold V now / Silver 1 finish last season
3.Role: Midlaner - Mage style of play
4.Your age and Time Zone: 21 and EST
5.Your best champions: Annie, Lissandra, Vel'Koz and Azir.
6.Why you want to join the team: I've played with my friends for a while (see: years), and I find that their goals in the game don't match with mine which is improving and honing skills to someday reach a skill level that I am quite happy with. I like to have fun while I'm doing it too, hell, it's a game after all!

1.IGN: beboman
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: gold 5
3.Role: mid/top
4.Your age and Time Zone: 21 and pst
5.Your best champions: vieger (when he gets fixed)/tryn/karth
6.Why you want to join the team? : because id like to have people to play with and have fun, and who knows we could work together and be pros one day :P

IGN:xXDarkMistzXx 
2.Solo q rank this/ last season:unRanked /silver 1
3.Role:mid
4.Your age and Time Zone:19/eastern
5.Your best champions:can learn all for team comp
6.Why you want to join the team? I been trying to find a serious team tired of trolls and really just want to try my best to get to the top. Ik im unranked but im willing to work to the top

1.IGN: ImTryingToLearn
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Current: Gold 2 Last: Gold 4
3.Role: Midlane
4.Your age and Time Zone: 18, Central
5.Your best champions: Ahri, Azir, Xerath, Syndra, Leblanc, Zed.
6.Why you want to join the team?: Playing with a coordinated team lets me enjoy the game a lot more than soloq.

1.IGN: kithkin
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Silver 3/Silver 5
3.Role: Mid
4.Your age and Time Zone: 21 yo/EST
5.Your best champions: Lissandra, Orianna, Ahri, Kassadin, Lulu
6.Why you want to join the team? 
I played on couple ranked 5s last season and those were by far the best times I had paying Lol. It's super enjoyable playing with 4 other people that take playing this game as seriously as I do. I love communication and I love shot-calling (why I play mid) and I feel like those strengths are mine are only truly brought out playing ranked 5s.

1.IGN: Redwolfrain
2.Solo q rank this/ last season: Gold 1 in Season 3, Silver 1 in Season 4 and currently Silver 1
3.Role: Mid
4.Your age and Time Zone: 24 EST
5.Your best champions: Ahri, Ziggs, Ryze, Zed, Yasuo, Lee Sin
6.Why you want to join the team?  I enjoy the team aspects of the game, but solo q does not live up to this with all the trolls or feeders. Im looking for a serious team that will mesh well togeather as we aim for higher Elos.
